statements: SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM subscribers WHERE plan = 'Premium';
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT id, name FROM subscribers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, email, plan FROM subscribers WHERE usage_statistics->>'login_count' > '10';
SELECT id, name, email FROM subscribers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM subscribers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE phone_number IN ('123456789', '987654321');
SELECT id, plan, usage_statistics FROM subscribers WHERE plan = 'premium' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM subscribers WHERE usage_statistics ->> 'visits' > '1000';
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT name, subscription_type FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, registration_date FROM subscribers;
SELECT * FROM usage_statistics;
SELECT subscriber_id, data_usage, call_duration FROM usage_statistics;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT name, subscription_type FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium';
SELECT subscriber_id, data_usage FROM usage_statistics WHERE data_usage > 1000 ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(call_duration) AS max_call_duration FROM usage_statistics WHERE subscriber_id = 1001;
SELECT DISTINCT subscription_type FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscription_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM subscribers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, data_usage FROM usage_statistics WHERE data_usage > 100;
SELECT operator_name, location FROM network_operators WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM subscribers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM subscribers ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT s.id, s.name, u.data_usage FROM subscribers s JOIN usage_statistics u ON s.id = u.subscriber_id WHERE u.data_usage > 100 ORDER BY u.data_usage DESC;

SELECT o.operator_name, COUNT(u.id) AS total_subscribers FROM network_operators o LEFT JOIN subscribers u ON o.id = u.id GROUP BY o.operator_name HAVING total_subscribers > 2 ORDER BY total_subscribers DESC;

SELECT s.name, u.data_usage, o.operator_name FROM subscribers s JOIN usage_statistics u ON s.id = u.subscriber_id JOIN network_operators o ON s.id = o.id WHERE u.data_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY s.name, u.data_usage DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT name, email FROM subscribers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE subscriber_id = 3;
SELECT plan_name, call_limit FROM plans WHERE data_limit > 5.0;
SELECT subscriber_id, usage_date, data_usage FROM usage_statistics ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM subscribers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM plans ORDER BY call_limit DESC, data_limit ASC;
SELECT s.name, u.usage_date, p.plan_name FROM subscribers s JOIN usage_statistics u ON s.subscriber_id = u.subscriber_id JOIN plans p ON s.subscriber_id = p.plan_id WHERE u.data_usage > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Subscriber;
SELECT name, email FROM Subscriber WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT operator_name, region FROM Operator ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT node_id, location, capacity FROM NetworkNode WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT signal_strength, area_code FROM NetworkCoverage WHERE operator_id = 2 ORDER BY signal_strength DESC;
SELECT * FROM Subscriber;
SELECT subscriber_id, name, email FROM Subscriber WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT operator_name, region FROM Operator ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT s.name, u.data_usage FROM Subscriber s JOIN UsageStatistics u ON s.subscriber_id = u.subscriber_id WHERE u.data_usage > 1.0 ORDER BY u.data_usage DESC;

SELECT n.location, nc.signal_strength FROM NetworkNode n JOIN NetworkCoverage nc ON n.node_id = nc.operator_id WHERE nc.signal_strength > 80 AND n.capacity > 100 ORDER BY n.location ASC, nc.signal_strength DESC;
